01.text: You’re off to great places, today is your day. Your mountain is waiting, so get on your way.

02.text: You always pass failure on the way to success.

03.text: No one is perfect - that’s why pencils have erasers.

04.text: Winning doesn’t always mean being first. Winning means you’re doing better than you’ve done before.

05.text: You’re braver than you believe, and stronger than you seem, and smarter than you think.

06.text: It always seems impossible until it is done.

07.text: Keep your face to the sunshine and you cannot see a shadow.

08.text: Once you replace negative thoughts with positive ones, you’ll start having positive results.

09.text: Positive thinking will let you do everything better than negative thinking will.

10.text: In every day, there are 1,440 minutes. That means we have 1,440 daily opportunities to make a positive impact.

11.text: The only time you fail is when you fall down and stay down.

12.text: When you are enthusiastic about what you do, you feel this positive energy. It’s very simple.

13.text: Positive anything is better than negative nothing.

14.text: Winning is fun, but those moments that you can touch someone’s life in a very positive way are better.

15.text: Virtually nothing is impossible in this world if you just put your mind to it and maintain a positive attitude.

16.text: Optimism is a happiness magnet. If you stay positive good things and good people will be drawn to you.

17.text: It makes a big difference in your life when you stay positive.

18.text: If opportunity doesn’t knock, build a door.

19.text: Happiness is an attitude. We either make ourselves miserable, or happy and strong. The amount of work is the same.

20.text: You are never too old to set another goal or dream a new dream.

21.text: The sun himself is weak when he first rises, and gathers strength and courage as the day gets on.

22.text: It’s not whether you get knocked down, it’s whether you get up.

23.text: The struggle you’re in today is developing the strength you need tomorrow.

24.text: The way I see it, if you want the rainbow, you gotta put up with the rain.

25.text: Every day may not be good... but there’s something good in every day.

26.text: The more you praise and celebrate your life, the more there is in life to celebrate.

27.text: Hard work keeps the wrinkles out of the mind and spirit.

28.text: The difference between ordinary and extraordinary is that little extra.

29.text: Let your unique awesomeness and positive energy inspire confidence in others.

30.text: Wherever you go, no matter what the weather, always bring your own sunshine.

31.text: If you want light to come into your life, you need to stand where it is shining.
